projects.title: Wort des Tages
projects.content: This Web Scraper retrieves the word of the day from https://www.duden.de/wort-des-tages and searches for the frequency, word division, meaning and origin of the word.

projects.title: Smart Display
projects.content: Smart Home dashboard that shows collected weather data, news headlines and upcoming Google Calendar Events.

projects.title: RaspberryPi Retro Clock
projects.content: RaspberryPi in an old alarm clock with smart functionalities (read news, check server status).

projects.title: Hacking a Garage Door Remote
projects.content: Hacking a garage door remote to control it with a website on an esp8266

projects.title: NodeMcu Led Ring Control
projects.content: NodeMcu webinterface to control a led ring. You can choose different animations and colors. Furthermore, you can adjust the brightness, speed and number of lit LEDs.

projects.title: Automatic Wallpaper Changer
projects.content: Set "bing's image of the day" as your daily background image.

projects.title: Simple Python Game
projects.content: A small game written in python where you shoot objects with a ball.

projects.title: Probe-Echo Algorithm Simulation
projects.content: Probe-Echo Algorithm for distributed systems. Each node is simulated by a thread.The network is simulated with a ConcurrentLinkedQueue.

projects.title: Vuejs Todo App
projects.content: A simple Todo-App that shows your progress.

projects.title: Spring Boot QR-Code
projects.content: Backend app with spring boot that generates QR-Codes.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.content: A small Netflix UI Clone written with knockoutjs and bootstrap.
